name: The Deep Cat | DEMO
description:
I'M SORRY IF THERE'S NO WEB BUILD, THAT DOESN'T WORK
The Deep Cat is an RPG but with a twist.. you're under the water !

Unfortunately, in this Demo, there's no combatsystem but the danger is still here...

Max's dad is a diver and one day, he didn't come for the diner. Max's mom is very worried and want to search him but she don't like swimming in water.. but he son does, so she send his son Max to dive and search for his Dad.

You can explore :

  • The house
  • The village
  • The sea depth

Missing things (in the demo) :

  • Dialogue
  • Combat system
  • Exchange 

Potentially, I can continue the development of the game, and I want to continue to progress the game but in my way. Because, this is my first game and I'm not a pro programmer, that's why there's some things that I coded at first but deleted at the end. So we'll see about that...
